alert.note: Alert for Rawlins; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:54PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Thomas and southeastern Rawlins Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 354 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Gem, or 9 miles north of Colby, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Thomas and southeastern Rawlins Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.
